title: I Have A Video Vixen In My Garage
itunes:title: I Have A Video Vixen In My Garage
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 30-year-old man and my wife is 28. I was recently laid off due to the pandemic, so money has been a little tight. Because of it, my wife is making me feel like less than a man. We have a 2 year old child and she is a stay-at-home mom so I am the sole breadwinner. My wife’s attitude has been horrible for weeks so I have been avoiding her, to avoid arguing with her.................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 30-year-old man and my wife is 28. I was recently laid off due to the pandemic, so money has been a little tight. Because of it, my wife is making me feel like less than a man. We have a 2 year old child and she is a stay-at-home mom so I am the sole breadwinner. My wife’s attitude has been horrible for weeks so I have been avoiding her, to avoid arguing with her.................
